title: After Annihilation: Would you want to survive?
description: The year is 2034. Madhavi is one among group of five friends, fresh out of engineering college, who land jobs in different cities of Iddis. But before their life can take off, war comes. In a series of sudden, blinding flashes of light, millions of lives are lost, incinerated in the fiery heat of a nuclear exchange that threatens to end the human race forever. At first, it seems Madhavi is the only one left alive in a world that has been devastated by global conflict. With nuclear fallout set to eliminate any survivors, finding sanctuary seems impossible, until she is rescued to Shunya, where begins a life she never wanted to live.
author: Gauri Mittal
